lender.name: Honoree
lender.loan_because: It gives me great pleasure to do small acts that mean so much and can make a great difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to achieve their goals by helping them to create a plan of action, by holding them capable, accountable and able.

lender.name: Gail
lender.whereabouts: Saranac Lake, Adirondack Mountains New York
lender.loan_because: It is my joyful obligation as part of the human family to give what I can to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional calligrapher and lettering artist. In other words, I have beautiful and unusual handwriting styles that businesses and individuals pay me for! I love what I do.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: DMLC
lender.loan_because: “Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.” ~ Marie Curie

lender.name: Armand & Angelina
lender.loan_because: Love is A Boomerang
lender.occupational_info: World P'opera Music -a fusion of classical, popular and world influences designed to unite humanity through music

lender.name: Aaron and Susan
lender.loan_because: We love helping people help themselves. We are particularly interested in helping Nicaragua - we've spent a lot of wonderful time there and would like to help give back to the community.
lender.occupational_info: Aaron plays music professionally and my company invests in renewable energy and cleantech.

lender.name: Erik Shunn
lender.loan_because: I would like to help make dreams come true for less fortunate people. I think Kiva is such a great concept!
lender.occupational_info: I am a business consultant

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: I figured I could help someone else be productive and help them better their lives. Since I live a bit of an idilic life, I could at least allow someone else to do something better with theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise a team of mechanics in a food processing plant.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I also have a small home buisness that I have as a hobby while I am home taking care of my little girl but I want to help all those out there who NEED the money a business produces to survive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom and I also have a buisness making and selling hair accessories for infants and children.

lender.name: Armonde and Ford
lender.loan_because: It is fun to help others.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in highschool.

lender.name: Ashish
lender.loan_because: when i came to US, i was in so much financial stress because of my studies that i could not see the best things in my life, i was fortunate that my parents helped me and then my girlfriend and friends came to help me, i think if not for myself i believe i owe for such wonderful people with me who never gave up on me and i hope i keep this fire burning till the end of my life
lender.occupational_info: well right now i am a student and once i get a job, i will try to benefit this society who has given us so much for so less.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: There have been times when i just needed $200-$300 to buy an item in which I could make a decent profit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student studying Business. I am also an eBay seller as well.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: To help give people a chance to support themselves proudly.
lender.occupational_info: I have done accounting for over 13 years

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: 'Do unto others as you would have done unto you'.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer tools to bridge between different systems or to augment the functionality of a single system.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world and help people. Loaning money like this is a great way for helping people.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed. My husband and I own a Business Brokeage.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: "The world in which you were born is just one model of reality. Other cultures are not failed attempts at being you: they are unique manifestations of the human spirit...quote by Wade Davis"

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for the abundant blessings of my life and believe I should use them to help others create better lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Floyd and Dani
lender.loan_because: We want to help someone less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Husband-works with computer programs. Wife works managing a wholesale warehouse.

lender.name: Don E
lender.loan_because: A hand up is more effective and more dignifying than a handout
lender.occupational_info: Helping companies improve how they do business

lender.name: Jill & Brian
lender.loan_because: every little bit counts.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I do not have much money. Because of this, I know how important some help can be from time to time.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I admire and appreciate proactive people who dream.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I believe it is what Christ would want us living in the economically developed world to do... Bobby Kennedy would remind his kids of what Jesus said in Luke, "... From everyone to whom much has been given, much will be required; and from the one to whom much has been entrusted, even more will be demanded." (Luke 12:48)
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Denver Josef Korbel School learning how to change the world, this is just one of many ways I am attempting to do so.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: It's the least that we can do. We have the luxury of living in the USA. Where we take many things for granted. This way we can help others, who knows when the day will come that we might need help, who will be there for us? I hope people like the KIVA family.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a management team of a casino. We make sure that all games are fair and according to state law.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I lived in Zimbabwe for 40 years and know there are so many deserving people who with just a little help can change their lives and those around them. When I needed help to start my business I was able to turn to a friend. Now I would like the opportunity to be a "friend" to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Helping women (and some men) take care of their skin and using massage and aromatherapy to manage stress.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: jane
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves. Wonderful Idea.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I am so incredibly Blessed and it is best to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I suffered a stroke in 1997 which left me unable to continue working.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: if you can help someone for $25 why not?

lender.name: Jessica & John
lender.loan_because: we have been very fortunate and privileged in our lives. We have been married for four years and though we haven't been blessed with children, we have decided to adopt. We can't give large amounts due to the bad economy but we give what can knowing that we are helping someone who really needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician assistant, I see patients, order studies if necessary and prescribe medications. John is a computer technician for a school district.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because:
"There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we crave most in life -- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind -- are always attained by giving them to someone else."
~Peyton Conway March

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of people helping people.

lender.name: Aaron & Jen
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help by giving a hand up with out hurting someone with a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computer systems and data networks.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Would like to help people who are trying to help themself
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the quailty of work is what my client expects.

lender.name: nichira
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to start a business and there's no greater feeling than helping someone else realize their dreams

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: Because a small amount of money can make a big difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in communications at an international humanitarian organization who has worked with Kiva in the field and I greatly respect the work Kiva does.

lender.name: Geller Family
lender.loan_because: To help others!

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful thing to see these dollars in action Quel merveilleux moyen d'aider ses voisins, car nous sommes tous voisins apres tout.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make a sensible choice in their biggest investment: their home

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: What could be more meaningful than lending a direct helping hand to others around the globe and watching them and their local communities thrive ...
lender.occupational_info: Culture and travel related freelance photography and writing

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to assist other small business entrepreneurs achieve their goals of financial independence, community involvement and prosperity; Kiva makes that possible.
lender.occupational_info: I manage two marinas on the Multnomah Channel, and sell Univera nutraceutical supplements to those looking for better health from plants (largest library in the world) and relentless scientific research (because it's the right thing to do).

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great concept...a little money goes a long way. I love knowing that I'm helping an entrepreneur provide for their family and it's a great reminder of how fortunate I am.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.occupational_info: I teach university-level Computer Science to advanced students in secondary school.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I think people who want to do good hard work to benefit their lives and the lives of their families deserves the chance to succeed. It also brings the people of this world closer together for the sake of good.
lender.occupational_info: Mom

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It's good for me.
lender.occupational_info: I help to solve problems in my company's computers

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I am a psychologist that is somewhat burnt out. I need to do this so I can feel like I am making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help adults with mental illnesses get treatment.

lender.name: John & Peg
lender.loan_because: Our small contribution along with many others make for a big improvement for someone that wants to improve their standard of living....we find it exciting to be able to help..
lender.occupational_info: Retired Electrical Engineer and small e-Bay business.

lender.name: Shahriar
lender.loan_because: Every second the world becomes increasingly more interdependent and fragile. Regardless of my geographical location, I will be directly or indirectly affected by the hardship of another human being on the other side of the planet.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful idea – the opportunity to help others better provide for themselves and their families.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I live

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: "Ubuntu" ... "I am what I am because of who we all are".
lender.occupational_info: I work as an adoption social worker. I help children around the world who need families- and families who want children!

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: others could use my money more than I can
lender.occupational_info: scientist

lender.name: Maree
lender.loan_because: When my husband was striken with cancer it was the kindness of strangers that kept a roof over our heads and helped us stay afloat and be there when he passed on. I swore I would do what I could to pay it forward when I could. I believe it is our duty as children of God to help one another whenever we are able. I teach my children that giving is important and paying it forward is essential to live a worthwhile life.
lender.occupational_info: I create graphic designs and websites for business' and work from home where I can continue to be a good mom to my youngest who is a junior in high school. I am a struggling single parent but know that whatever I can loan to someone else can give them a hand up to provide for their families.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in a university.

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: This is how I make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people to be successful in running computer businesses here in Silicon Valley.

lender.name: Tim and Marla
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help out small business entrepeneurs make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I sell air conditioning equipment to homeowners and businesses and Marla is a medical secretary for a busy medical office.

lender.name: CHANTEL
lender.loan_because: i wanted to help others
lender.occupational_info: decorate with balloons

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my responsibility to help other people when and where I can. I want to help people help themselves and that is what Kiva does. I have needed help in the past and now it is my turn to give not receive. I appreciate the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: My Husband & I have a small Drywall installation business & I operate a small retail space in an indoor flea market.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to change the lives of people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I attend UCLA where I am a pre-med student. I hope to one day travel and use my knowledge as a doctor to help others who are less fortunate.

lender.name: delio
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Harper
lender.loan_because: I like to help people

lender.name: Winifred
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference.

lender.name: Deshishku Family
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help someone help themself

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: We're all riders on this amazing Planet Earth together, no matter what nation, country, religion, family or community we think we belong to. Helping each other and getting along is the only choice --there is simply no other option.
lender.occupational_info: Modifying and creating artwork and photos for use in publications, posters, signs, billboards, advertisements, etc.

lender.name: LIZ AND MARTY
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and wish to pass those blessings on to others. We appreciate this opportunity to be able to assist others who are less fortunate and just need a little help to make their lives easier. I believe God helps those that help themselves and the entrepreneurs in this program are brave and hardworking! They are an inspiration to us and set a wonderful example.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a trade consultant focusing on Customs import and export rules and regulations. My husband works on airplanes with a large company that handles government contracts.

lender.name: Patti & Larry
lender.loan_because: We can!! We are happy to help someone who is trying to help her or himself and who may only need a tiny bit of lift to make it over the top. We choose to help in Kenya because we visited there in 2005 and found many hardworking people who just need a helping hand.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: Because I believe that God has provided for me and my family in such a way sa to allow me to share with those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I fix U.S. Air Force aircraft.

lender.name: Peg & Don
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping people!

lender.name: Jeff and Eliza
lender.loan_because: We want to help people and share with them .
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in making new medicines. I basically work on figuring out the right sized dose to help the patient without causing side-effects.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want people who work hard to be successful and happy in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage raw materials for a company that makes products to reduce air pollution created by cars and trucks.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I don't have much but I like to help hard-working people in countries I have had the good fortune to visit.
lender.occupational_info: I teach secondary school science classes and lead trips during my school breaks to: Rwanda, Uganda, Tanzania, Kenya, Peru, Ecuador etc.

lender.name: JoJo's kitten
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in fifth grade at school.

lender.name: Patti & Joe
lender.loan_because: To help others improve their lives and help their families have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired professionals who are thankful for our lives and wish to share and help others.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I am very humble to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I repair machine shop equipment.

lender.name: PROGRAM Realty, LLC
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with good fortune and would like to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell real estate in the state of Florida.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to give everyone an equal opportunity to make a living for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who takes care of sick babies in the hospital. They are either sick with illness or from being born too early.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's a neat concept. Not only do you help people, it is fun.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Barrister & Solicitor specializing in criminal law.

lender.name: The Menagerie
lender.loan_because: We believe in investing in people and giving them a chance to help themselves.

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: I love knowing that I can help others make a better life for themselves. Those that have the desire to become more deserve a chance to make it happen!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time office manager in the construction industry.

lender.name: Dan and Lisa
lender.loan_because: We should all do something to help others in need. This is an innovative way to pay it forward and not just once but over and over.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I care about human beings and hate to see anyone suffer.

lender.name: Alex Anthony
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in a nation where we have more than some people could ever dream of having. This small loan is different from most charities in that it "teaches a man to fish" rather than just feeding him for a day.
lender.occupational_info: I research the materials left behind by our ancestors in order to better understand our shared human history.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe that when people within a community prosper, the community prospers as well, and that those people are the ones who know best what that community needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a PBS station making sure that everything that is scheduled to air does so properly, and in the event we go off the air I diagnose the problem and get everything working again.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world by helping less fortumate people. If possible, I would like to help individuals in Lebanon.

lender.name: Mary Jane
lender.loan_because: ...it is in giving that we receive

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others make their lives better both for themselves and for their families.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around.

lender.name: - mike ッ
lender.loan_because: I live supported by my karma.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entertainers to create exceptional shows.

lender.name: cecilia
lender.loan_because: I have so much. I want to make a difference in another person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I teach young children 5 years old- 10 years old. I help them with reading and writing.

lender.name: Michael & Jeannie
lender.loan_because: We have been given the means through this wonderful organization to reach out across the world and help someone, somewhere reach a goal, and perhaps make this a more humane world.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it's what my grandfather would have done. He was a man that taught me the value of humanity and compassion. I miss him....
lender.occupational_info: I work in the pharmaceutical industry but my real passion is politics and the theatre. One in the same I suppose in some people's eyes! :)

lender.name: Jen and Grant
lender.loan_because: "Who's happier? The uniters or the dividers? The builders or the breakers? The givers or the takers? I think you know the answer There is a whole world out there that needs you, down the street or across the ocean. GIVE." - Bill Clinton

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to make lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to middle school students. My students are great and I enjoy my job immensely.

lender.name: SUSAN
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible to everyone on our planet. There are special countries that America owes more to so I try to give to deserving people in those ones.
lender.occupational_info: I travel and write about my journeys and the people I meet along the way, and publish articles in magazines and on the Internet. I am a poet in my heart and on the page when I find the time.

lender.name: Mazy Gray
lender.loan_because: we are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: Treading lightly; the sound of change begins with silence.

lender.name: ChicagoBeth
lender.loan_because: I believe it is possible to change the world one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Helping students become life-long learners.

lender.name: Sanny
lender.loan_because: It is for a great cause. By banding together to help other, we are able to reach more people, help others help themselves and in some small way make a huge difference in the lives of so many...
lender.occupational_info: I am a home school Mom of two boys, a nurse by profession and an artist by choice.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help other business minded people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people recover from injuries/illnesses by providing therapy services.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference for someone less fortunate than me. It will give us great pleasure to know that someone else has a better life and that we helped accomplish it. My number one dream is to do charity work, or set up a foundation of our own, we just don't have the means at this point in our lives, this is a perfect way to begin. Im so excited to get started and help someone.
lender.occupational_info: Management of a medicial facility. I do everything from answer the phone, to admitting patients. Help set up their care, and educate them on the process they will be going through . It requires a kind person to help them through their fears and concerns. I follow through until they have completed treatment. I also do alot of accounting work, book work and banking

lender.name: Abbie
lender.loan_because: I can afford to donate a small amount to help other people make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I teach preschool children with special needs, such as mental retardation, Down syndrome, or speech and language delays.

lender.name: Karma G
lender.loan_because: there are so many entrepreneurs in poverty who face serious capital constraints. Because of poor access to capital many poor entrepreneurs must forego investments that have very short payback periods. For example, if a shopkeeper can afford to buy more inventory her sales go up, her business expands, and she can pay back the loan very quickly. Solving the problem of access to capital through microfinance is a very low cost way to help the very poor pull themselves out of poverty, educate their children, and feed their families.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family with a variety of occupations. The dad teaches in a university, the mom teaches very young children with special needs, one daughter hires college students to work as teachers, one daughter works in Tanzania teaching young children about aids, and the youngest daughter is in her last year at High School.

lender.name: Jodee
lender.loan_because: It is a great feeling to to help someone that I know is trying to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Develop and communicate marketing programs for major tech company

lender.name: Abhijit
lender.loan_because: I can play Warren Buffet on a much smaller scale!
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer systems that store and analyze large amounts of data

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: With all the wealth in this world there is no good reason any man, woman, or child should ever go to sleep hungry. I loan because I love humanity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a prison reentry program that prepares men for their return to the community. The Fresh Start Program is an intensive, jail-based program of vocational training and group counseling. It is balanced by a community-based component that includes support groups, individual "coaching" and one-on-one assistance in finding and keeping jobs.

lender.name: Chris Cade
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to empower others to empower themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I inspire and empower others in their spiritual journey.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: We are using this as a homeschooling project.
lender.occupational_info: Perform marriage ceremonies for people who do not want a religious wedding.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves to a better life!

lender.name: Stained Glass Girl
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who help themselves, despite all of life's struggles and challenges. I believe good things happen to good people. And I believe everyone deserves a chance to thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a very large financial institution who has an extensive global presence. I started there when I was 20 years old and have been there now for 33 years. I am in human resources, which allows me to work with and help many of our employees all over the world. I enjoy my job and am grateful for it. My company took a chance on me by hiring me when I was young, not much experience, right out of school. So that is why I want to give that same chance to you. I am also trying to start a new business on the side, stained glass, to make extra money for my family. So I understand how important it is to be self-sufficient and to be able to provide for my family.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to give back to all those around the world.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to learn about small businesses and other parts of the world.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I love to eat, sleep and eat some more.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to start a new business.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world create thriving businesses in order to help themselves, their families, their communities, and the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently working on my Associates degree in Anthropology.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: God blesses us to bless others and to be a blessing to others. It is always an honor to help others move one step closer to their destiny. Someone did it for me and I must forward that on.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get clear, get a plan, and confidently live out their dreams.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: it's a step in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: Using computers to connect business globally.

lender.name: Cheri
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am making a positive contribution and improving the lives of others. The satisfaction of seeing their success is the most rewarding thing of all. I love it!
lender.occupational_info: I am hired by companies to find employees to fill scientific and technical positions.

lender.name: The Reubens
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and are able to help others!

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I love that I can be a part of something so wonderful to help change people's lives for the better!
lender.occupational_info: I work with Seabiotics, helping people around the world with their health through the use of liquid marine oils, omega 3's and AKG's which helps with inflammation to reduce pain and rebuild the immune system.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I feel that people who are willing to work to better themselves should be supported in achieving their desires.

lender.name: Kelly Takuma
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: In the summer of 2003, I had the opportunity to travel, for the first time, to Southeast Asia. It was as remote and distant from any normal routine of life that I had experienced. It was both everything and nothing that I had ever imagined. Since then, I have traveled again and again to that part of the world, and every trip back leaves a lasting impression on my life.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I need to buy some products for Hair Cutting Salon, something like Dryer, New cutting machine, heater,Germix Machine, Sofflo Standard (natural hair) Peduquire machine

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: Produce and ship posters and fine art around the world.

lender.name: Kylie
lender.occupational_info: I work for AIESEC - more than 50,000 students across 100+ countries working toward making a positive impact in society through responsible leadership and cultural understanding.

lender.name: Britinus
lender.loan_because: it is a brilliant idea and I believe that everyone should "Be the change you wish to see in the world" - Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: Numbers person

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help somebody who has less than me. It makes me feel great.

lender.name: Yvonne & Laurent
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping people who are less fortunate than ourselves, to lift themselves out of poverty. When it comes to developing the third world, we have more faith in individuals (specifically women) than in the state.
lender.occupational_info:
Yvonne: Keeping the loonies on the path
Laurent : A business version of the Mad Hatter's Tea Party

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: Something so small from me, can be so big to another
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the earth, one small piece at a time. I prune trees, I cut grass, I plant new grass, I rake leaves,

lender.name: Ogechi
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I know how hard it is to get the things needed. I want someone to be blessed in their venture.
lender.occupational_info: Reiki Master/Teacher, Doula, Ra Sekhi Therapist, Glorious LIght Meditation Teacher

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Design and Develop software applications and components

lender.name: Anella
lender.loan_because: Because if everyone did one small thing to make the world a better place so many problems could be solved. This is my one small thing.
lender.occupational_info: Wanna be photographer. Or writer. I can never decide.

lender.name: gretchen
lender.loan_because: I can't stand the thought of other parents suffering because they can't give their children what they need.
lender.occupational_info: I serve young women who have been charged with serious crimes. Basically, I give them tips on how to live their lives better: how to fight drug addiction, depression, manage their relationships to others and themselves. I encourage them to share their stories and to listen and challenge each other.

lender.name: Polly & Mel
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: George Bronstein
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed. Kiva loans enable me to provide that opportunity to others and positively impact their life.
lender.occupational_info: My work entails long hours in front of a computer focusing on reports, accounts, funding options and Excel spreadsheets.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because:
I have lived abroad several times and have seen first hand the difficulties others have in trying to get a start and get ahead in life.
I was given loans by the government of my country to finish school and have been grateful for those. I often wished other countries had similar programs. This is an opportunity for me to help others have a better life.
Everyone on the earth deserves the right to a happy life and deserves to make that life better for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former teacher and now a stay at home mom

lender.name: Masaya
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who are willing to improve their life.

lender.name: Tetsuya
lender.loan_because: I agree with Kiva's idea that I found on documentary TV program.

lender.name: Judy & Mark
lender.loan_because: It is the most practical way to really help poorer people get on their feet. Everyone has or will need some kind of help in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Mark is an artist who makes statues of famous people from all over the world - like at Madame Tussauds in London. Judy is a nurse who spent 3 wonderful years working in Sierra Leone, West Africa.

lender.name: Christopher Lochhead
lender.loan_because: Helping entrepreneurs succeed is fun. A lot of kind people have helped me. it is a great pleasure to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: For 20 years i helped build and start technology companies. my area of expertise is marketing, sales, and technology.

lender.name: YUKO
lender.loan_because: Please,Pray for Japan. Ore para Japon. I hope that my small loans will help people to make their life better.

lender.name: Kyoko
lender.occupation: Assistant Manager of real estate deveelopment
lender.loan_because: I want to support the people who will strongly try to make effort for thier lives and future
lender.occupational_info: Imagine people's happiness, plan it, and realize it through my work

lender.name: Tomonori
lender.occupational_info: Computer Engineer

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work creating tools that people use on their computers each day that help them run banks and other financial institutions. This lets them lend money to people who need it as well as help people use their hard earned money to further their lives and businesses.

lender.name: Tomoyuki
lender.loan_because: the best way to help people is to raise their motivations by approving their business plans.
lender.occupational_info: analysing complex systems and thinking how to maintain diversity

lender.name: Shabaz & Marzy
lender.loan_because: Lending to a business can have a ripple effect possibly improving the lives of many by creating employment. It will also improve the standard of living of people who want to help themselves rather than wait for charity.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing and the law of attraction.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that support nurses in treatment and rehabilitation from substance abuse and mental health issues

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I'd like to helping other people. I think this is the best way to help people help themselves. It small things can make a big difference.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with many opportunities to experience a wonderful life and I want to find ways to share the benefits I have received
lender.occupational_info: My work is focussed on helping people succeed in what they do. I happen to make electronics components.

lender.name: Taka
lender.loan_because: everybody needs somebody.

lender.name: Mari
lender.loan_because: I was watching tv and when I switched the channel it shows about KIVA and I thought of why not be a part of it and I can help those who's in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a house wife with two teenagers and their father died with a car accident. I remarried 4 years ago and with my hobby doing crochet and sewing , I thought of doing something outside and earn a bit for my hobby. I do the receptionist if theres a big event , exhibition here in Japan . We have 3 big Forum Halls and every month theres a big event . The biggest event I couldn't forget was last February The Foodex International Exhibition. I seen a lot of people all over the world introducing their good foods. It was a good experienced for me.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: It something small that I can do that can make a big difference!
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals with disabilities to be welcomed, supported and respected in the community. So they are not limited to "special" programs, but fully part of our community.

lender.name: Aletha
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kismit and Karma. Each one of us can make a difference in small ways that produce an infinite possibility of great outcomes.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit healthcare organization that provides care and jobs to its' surrounding communities.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I know I am having a direct impact on these individuals who are working for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in computer technology for over 30 years and still teach people in new software applications.

lender.name: Kristopher
lender.loan_because: It's a way to make a small difference for someone else on the planet -- person to person .

lender.name: trish
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. As a business owner I understand what an impact even a small amount of financial assistance can be. I am so excited to be a part of such an amazing organization.
lender.occupational_info: I own online children's retail stores. One site has very modern furniture, gifts, and toys from all over the world. The other site is more of a boutique.

lender.name: Keyona
lender.occupational_info: Helping young people as well as families get connected to and fully use services to help them help themselves.

lender.name: Mike and Debra
lender.loan_because: It feels good
lender.occupational_info: My wife is a traveling nurse and I am retired. We travel around the US working in different hospitals.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to support and encourage entrepreneurship and self reliance.
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology Consulting and web development.

lender.name: christina
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: yuki-H
lender.loan_because: I'am able to do it.

lender.name: masumi
lender.loan_because: One person is the sake in the world and the world is a one sake. I approve fully of the kiva's idea.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher,japan.

lender.name: Bridgette
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major healthcare insurance company.

lender.name: Rocky Mountain High
lender.loan_because: we care.

lender.name: Jenn & Brad
lender.loan_because: We are blessed with our health and a great life. We want others to have all of the opportunities we have.

lender.name: Toshi Ide
lender.loan_because: Resonated with the concept of Kiva and would like to contribute to give an opportunity to change lives of people by supporting the initial funds.
lender.occupational_info: I am running a company, gConscious, Inc. that stimulates green consciousness of people and business. It is one of the first carbon offset provider in Japan. Also, I serve as a co-chairman of LOHAS Business alliance and a chairman of Carbon Offset Association.

lender.name: brian
lender.loan_because: Real progress is progress in charity, all other advances being secondary thereto.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: we are all connected

lender.name: Fenton
lender.loan_because: I like to make people smile and I am a firm believer that kindness will come back to you ten fold!!
lender.occupational_info: I sell western clothing, accessories and sporting goods.

lender.name: Mathilde+Erik
lender.loan_because: For the fun!
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in Mathematics. My wife works at the university.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It is very practical way to be helpful.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a clinical consultant to a special education program.

lender.name: Jason Sherrill
lender.loan_because: I enjoy sharing what God has blessed me with to help people who want to work, grow and improve themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I provide the knowledge & resources to help people make e-commerce & business websites profitable.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can make a positive difference even with my modest income.
lender.occupational_info: Keeping it between the lines.

lender.name: mykidsmom
lender.loan_because: It is so hard to raise children, struggle to provide for them, and try to improve your situation when you have limited resources. I have been very blessed by God, and I want to share those blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an RN full time at a community hospital and I also work part time at a pediatrician's office.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: In some small way, I'd like to help reduce poverty and positively impact the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small boutique and I understand the challenge of keeping a small business profitable and growing. Through this business, I support local artisans. I've been lucky enough to be able to follow my dreams, recently moving to France ... and helping others do the same is gratifying.

lender.name: Sharyn
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves, that way we both feel good. It's my little contribution to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired nurse and respiratory therapist, I now volunteer in a thrift shop which donates all the profits for scholarships. I also have a website that offers continuing education to Long Term Care Administrators, Assisted Living managers and their staff.

lender.name: Tracie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity

lender.name: Maya & Eric
lender.loan_because: Helping individuals to make a difference in the world...KIVA is one of the great ideas of the 21st century!
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with Autism and Maya is a photo editor.

lender.name: Charline
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sujal
lender.loan_because: we all deserve the opportunity to create a brighter future for ourselves, our families, and our fellow man. It is both our right and our responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I help provide tools to future physicians, enabling them to help others to the best of their abilities. We try to restore and maintain health to allow individuals to simply live their lives. I am living a wonderful life and I hope I can help others do the same.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed in my life. I want to make someone else's life happier.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it

lender.name: otakup0pe
lender.loan_because: it restores faith in humanity.
lender.occupational_info: Working on cutting edge technology for the past decade.

lender.name: Anjali
lender.loan_because: I am running a Business where i suppy tiffins for the student and working people in a very low rate i need a fund to run my business smoothly
lender.occupational_info: we prepare totaly Home made food and supply this for studens and working men and womens

lender.name: Adela & Elias (& Jose)
lender.loan_because: Giving a person independence so that he will not have to depend on tzedakah (charity) is the greatest form of charity. Darle a una persona independecia para que no necesite dependender de la caridad (tzedaka) es la forma mas noble de la caridad.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in people's business in order to develop them and make them grow. Just like Kiva does around the world.

lender.name: Susan and Mom
lender.loan_because: kiva can not only change lives in the third world -- it can change our lives as well.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: What better gift than to help someone help themselves.

lender.name: Kazuyoshi
lender.loan_because: If I can help somebody

lender.name: Anja
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way with microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do research in a small department at a large university. In my spare time, I knit, often to my own design.

lender.name: Ashlan
lender.loan_because: It's so much FUN!!!! ; - ), and I know I'm helping someone, and the money goes to something useful.

lender.name: Yufeng
lender.loan_because: I want to do somthig for someone who really need help.

lender.name: Scotty
lender.loan_because: Life, water & money are better in motion.

lender.name: Dave Marcus
lender.occupation: Software; music and photog on the side
lender.loan_because: Kiva lets me feel like a hero to one or two or a few real people: I get to buck a banking system that ignores the poor and I get to directly make credit available to the hard-working poor to build or expand their small business
lender.occupational_info: Part of the sales team for a software company.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy animals a lot and I like to help people.

lender.name: Kim & John
lender.loan_because: This is a great expansion of the work done by others in India and elsewhere. As Helen Keller said, "We cannot do everything, but we can do something:.
lender.occupational_info: Kim works with hearing impaired adults and children, testing, finding the right hearing aids for them and counseling them and their families. John sell restaurent equipment and supplies.

lender.name: Stacey & TJ
lender.loan_because: We all need support to achieve our dreams and share our gifts. "One day our grandchildren will go to museums to see what poverty was like." -Muhammad Yunus

lender.name: Kazumi
lender.loan_because: to help the people who have enthusiasm.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, no matter how small it may seem.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to 13- and 14-year-olds in a public school.

lender.name: Alex L
lender.loan_because: it was there
lender.occupational_info: all work and no play makes Alex a dull boy

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to play a small part in helping someone build a better future.

lender.name: Trina
lender.loan_because: It is yet one more small, simple thing I can do to make a difference. I also promote microlending to others - so it's important to model the way!
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn more about how to live sustainably.

lender.name: Kim & Charlie
lender.loan_because: We like the direct impact we have on someones life on the other side of the planet. We know the hard work it takes to run your own business and welcome the chance to help someone else achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: We own a garage. We repair all makes of cars and trucks. We are in our 10th year of business.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: When I was a kid, a loan changed the direction of my life by allowing me to go back to school.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to sing songs about trucks and trains and love.

lender.name: Lidya
lender.loan_because: No one should be hungry.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: it's ridiculously easy and, as everybody knows, its easier to be a giver than a receiver. ;P
lender.occupational_info: I help improve computer programs and devices used for medical purposes.

lender.name: Siegwardt Family
lender.loan_because: We want to and we understand how hard it is to start/run a business.
lender.occupational_info: We make signs, banners, stickers, magnets and decals for schools, sporting groups, small businesses and individuals.

lender.name: Yui
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity and I've been blessed with many. To whom much is given, much is expected, and this is a small way in which I can hope to create big change.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to be successful. Kiva.org provides the vehicle for me to become a micro-angel investor.
lender.occupational_info: I account for all the financial data in a manufacturing company in Southern California.

lender.name: Jenn & Nelson
lender.loan_because: We believe in leading by example.
lender.occupational_info: We run a home based business that sells whole food supplements (vitamins) to individuals. We also help others to start their own home based business too. Nelson also works as a musician and teaches drums.

lender.name: Thuy
lender.loan_because: It is great to be able to help others. I am so thankful for Kiva organization. Through Kiva, I can give others oppotunities to build businesses to generate income so that they provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I worked as an accountant for 11 yrs. I was pretty good at it but I never thought that it was what I wanted to do for the rest of my life. In 2010, I had an opportunity to get into real estate and found it very exiciting. So I am now a real estate investor. Check our my site.....

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs. Their projects are exciting.

lender.name: Nick
lender.occupational_info: 8 of these loans are from a class at the San Francisco State College of Business.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: It is a great feeling to help people work towards their goals.

lender.name: daniela
lender.loan_because: it feels amazing that such a small amount of money to us can be of so much aid to another family and help them get one step closer to getting out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending a local university and also work at a local restaurant part time.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea to help someone become independent and help those in need.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: A few years ago, I started my own business with an initial investment of about $250. It hasn't exactly made me rich, but it's done well and I find the work far more rewarding than anything I'd done previously. I firmly believe that anyone with the drive and entrepreneurial spirit to go into business for themselves should not be denied the opportunity for lack of startup capital.
lender.occupational_info: I design and produce electronic devices, mostly for communications.

lender.name: Irma & Jim
lender.loan_because: We feel it's the responsibility of those who have to help those who have not.
lender.occupational_info: Jim continues to create beautiful paintings and Irma knits; both LOVE to travel.

lender.name: Kristy&Robert
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. It's amazing what can happen if everyone gives just a little bit. We are so grateful to be a part of this organization!

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world.

lender.name: Michael C.
lender.loan_because: I wish for everyone the opportunity to succeed in their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of buying medical supplies for a hospital.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to succeed on their own. Often, people just need a chance and an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get jobs by writing resumes that put them in the best possible light. Also, by helping them figure out the best way to search for a job.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part, however small, to help improve the lives of others. What goes around comes around!
lender.occupational_info: I support families who have children with disabilities, helping them lead the life they want and deserve, giving them learning opportunities to become as independent as possible.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because:
"good people of the earth now can tell, there is no us and them."
Melissa Etheridge

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with agencies who are in the process of getting new computer systems. I help them design the system so it meets all of their needs.

lender.name: maura
lender.loan_because: As you humans, we all need to support each other. When you empower someone with good, you change the world in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales for a large company that sells legal and business intelligence solutions.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I would want others to do the same for me.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and I work at a nonprofit that studies toxicology in whales.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Just to reach out.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home to take care of my children.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Billie Jo
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others and show Gods love. It is the least I can do for Him after all He has done for each and everyone of us!
lender.occupational_info: I stay home to raise my two children and take care of my husband while he goes out to his job everyday.

lender.name: Marianela
lender.loan_because: I like people

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can, and because if I can help somebody then it's only the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office. I am not in management, nor am I a supervisor or anyone's "boss". I help ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of my company's information and resources.

lender.name: Diane & Don
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to share our abundance with others.
lender.occupational_info: Don is a consultant in the insurance industry. Diane is a retired medical transcriptionist.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I want to help others as others have helped me.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Then the king will say to those at his right hand, 'Come, you that are blessed by my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world; for I was hungry and you gave me food, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you welcomed me, I was naked and you gave me clothing, I was sick and you took care of me, I was in prison and you visited me.'
lender.occupational_info: Making Afghanistan a better place to live with the US Army!

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to give someone a hand up, and to be able to do it again and again with a single loan.

lender.name: Stephanie and Marley
lender.loan_because: My husband and I feel so blessed and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Loving, teaching, and raising my daughter Marley.

lender.name: Homer
lender.loan_because: I'm filthy rich.

lender.name: Steve & Jemma Copley
lender.loan_because: We're lucky enough to be able to
lender.occupational_info: Teaching children to become good global citizens (or at least think of others now and then!)

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I think and act both locally and globally to make my community and the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a photography business. I am a retired social worker and human resources director. We both volunteer in our community.

lender.name: Nysha
lender.loan_because: All that we give into the lives of others comes back into our own.
lender.occupational_info: I teach skin care and color cosmetics. More importantly I teach women how to run a thriving business so that they can improve their lives and the lives of those they love.

lender.name: Jen & John
lender.loan_because: Trying to make the world a better place isn't just a possibility, it's an imperative.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make sure healthcare is safe and effective for everyone.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: It feels good to do something for someone that needs a bit of a lift that could change their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: Protect Public funds of government

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Man impacts the earth most directly through farming. I vigorously support sustainable communities and farming.
lender.occupational_info: I teach plant agriculture to college students.

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who want to better their lives, in hopes that one day, they will pass it on.

lender.name: Enrique & Jessika
lender.loan_because: We want to help someone that is making an effort to better themselves and provide for themselves or their family.
lender.occupational_info: He works with computers in the US Navy. She is finishing her Doctorate Degree in Physical Therapy.

lender.name: Tynan
lender.loan_because: It makes me smile

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: helping others brings me life and i am here to live.
lender.occupational_info: i made a list of all the things i enjoy and that i'm good at and once i knew all those things it became my job.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can help others to enjoy financial security... and helping people is just the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I supervise the operation of the engine room on Nuclear Powered Aircraft Carriers.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance. I've had a lot of support and help to get to the place that I am today. It's my turn to give back. Also, I want to teach my son that the world is a much bigger place than just us.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people and corporations in fufilling their void.

lender.name: Paula
lender.occupational_info: I work with men who are court ordered to counseling because they have battered their wives or partners.

lender.name: Chrissy
lender.loan_because: I believe in "paying it forward" and that one person can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I partner and assist clients in finding the best hotels for their upcoming meetings/conferences

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain a park on a river. This involves fixing things when they break, removing trash, keeping the grass mowed, removing fallen trees, and anything else that needs to be done so that people may enjoy the space.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become who they truly belive they can be.
lender.occupational_info: I just go to school.

lender.name: Lauroge
lender.loan_because: Love is person-to-person!

lender.name: Kylie
lender.loan_because: It's just a great idea. It's about dignity and hope . . .

lender.name: Sunil & Vandana
lender.loan_because: every bit helps. It is your turn now.

lender.name: Johnelle
lender.loan_because: I love to give and help the less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am an special education teacher full time, and a part time entrepreneur.

lender.name: Leona
lender.loan_because: I want to help in my small way

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: This is something that would've helped my father and my family a long time ago.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team for JP Morgan Chase Bank. Our goal is to help our clients by resolving their issues and providing the best customer service available.

lender.name: Julie A.
lender.loan_because: the cost of a Starbucks run can help a family build their business.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love helping others. I help my students every day, and I want to take giving to the next level.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Algebra at a high school in Phoenix, Arizona. My students are 14 to 16 years old.

lender.name: Liza
lender.loan_because: It feels great to give.
lender.occupational_info: I help children with speech and language disabilities.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: Life as a Western white person is steeped in privilege though it goes mostly unrecognized by Westerners. We live self indulgent lives with little or no thought for the other less fortunate inhabitants of this fantastic planet. I loan because this is one way small way to rectify that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I am studying graphic design. I am hoping one day to become a teacher so I can help other people to express themselves using graphic design.

lender.name: Lina
lender.occupation: Sales; Chamber of Commerce; Busines Broker
lender.loan_because: Inspiration of Muhammad Yunus and his book about the Grameen bank. Fun of involvement and happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: 1) I manage a small town Chamber of Commerce 2) I am licensed as a business broker and have helped to sell small businesses.

lender.name: chizuko
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people who work very hard in the difficult situation to bring up the children.

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: people need a hand up - not a hand out

lender.name: Jeffery
lender.loan_because: I just want to help out. Nothing more, nothing less.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I am making a difference and it feels great.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee testers who test health insurance software.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I fix big machines.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I work for a children's charity. The Foundation supports children taken into protective custody in Orange County, California because of abuse or neglect. The focus is on youth emancipating from the foster care system through many programs helping them with everything from scholarships for school to housing to learning to negotiate life on their own.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: after working in the computer business for 40 years, it is time for me to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer community service.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It's such a small action that can make such a big difference in someone's life. Why wouldn't you want to be a part of giving someone a chance to live out their dreams? The fact that these loans improve the lives of the business owners AND their families just multiplies the impact of the loan.
lender.occupational_info: I'd like to think of myself as an old fashioned "stewardess". In a fast paced and sometimes impersonal travel/service industry, I go out of may make my passengers feel welcome. I try to give each of them individual attention so they see and feel that I truly appreciate them choosing to give my airline or their business.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I believe teaching a man to fish will feed him for a life time.
lender.occupational_info: I bring financial data into banks or other financial institutions.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: I know what it means to have a goal to better oneself. I could not have achieved my goal without the help of others. Now I do all I can to help people, even a stranger, achieve theirs.

lender.name: karen
lender.occupation: Timken Co. Roller Bearing Factory Employee-Retired
lender.loan_because: i am stingy. to give is to receive.
lender.occupational_info: Assembly line factory worker producing high quality timken tapered roller bearings. Retired

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: i am the walrus...
lender.occupational_info: cog in the evil corporate machine...just trying to do my part

lender.name: Chewie
lender.occupational_info: I help people to understand the impacts of their decisions, and to make decisions that have impacts.

lender.name: Colette
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it is great to be in service to others.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people succeed
lender.occupational_info: I supply labels to companies in the agriculture business.

lender.name: Farheen
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to give back to the world. What a great feeling to know that I have helped someone in need, who can run thier own business
lender.occupational_info: I have worked with children all my life. I get a great satisfaction to see those smiles and endless hugs and kisses I receive all day. I provide a nurturing, healthy, and a safe, learning environment for all children

lender.name: Ken (Khanh) Tran
lender.loan_because: I'd like to live in a better world with more self sufficient people and Micro-loans are the best way to achieve this objective.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Aerospace industry relating to Space Exploration.

lender.name: latisha
lender.loan_because: There are people who have dreams, but just need a little push.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Soldier in the United States Army. I've been a Soldier for 18 years now.

lender.name: Ralph & Allison
lender.loan_because: We in America have so much. Too much in many cases. If we can, by giving a small amount, change the life of someone who is struggling day to day, then we are fortunate indeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional poet. My husband is a Disabled American Vet who served in Vietnam on three tours of duty in the 1960's.

lender.name: Tetsuya & Eriko
lender.loan_because: We will make the earth happy!

lender.name: Charyn
lender.loan_because: My soul requires me to give.
